test_files.name: flow_quick_action_career_path
test_files.title: Quick Action: Discover a Career Path & Explore Programs

phases.objective: Navigate to https://coursera.org and navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/career-academy and click on the 'Careers' navigation link

assertions.description: Verify that career Academy page displays various career roles
Verify that each career role listing includes a description

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/career-academy/roles/data-analyst?level=beginner&recommenderid=role-ranker and select any available career role from the listings on the career academy page

assertions.description: Verify that selected career role page displays relevant job insights and credentials

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/professional-certificates/meta-data-analyst?recommenderid=role-ranker and click on any associated professional certificate or specialization link displayed on the career role page

assertions.description: Verify that selected learning program page provides an overview with key details

test_files.name: flow_price_comparer_business_solutions
test_files.title: Price/Feature Comparer: Evaluate Business Learning Solutions

phases.objective: Navigate to https://coursera.org and navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/business and click on the 'For Businesses' navigation link

assertions.description: Verify that business solutions page presents different options for organizations

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/business/teams?promocode=aug30-2025 and navigate to any specific business solution page (e.g., 'Teams' or 'Enterprise' solutions link)

assertions.description: Verify that specific business solution page highlights key features and benefits

phases.objective: Navigate to Review the features and benefits presented for the business solution

assertions.description: Verify that business solution page clearly outlines pricing models or contact options

test_files.name: flow_information_seeker_partners
test_files.title: Information Seeker: Research Partner Institutions and Offerings

phases.objective: Navigate to https://coursera.org and navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/about/partners and navigate to an 'About' or 'Partners' section of the website

assertions.description: Verify that partners page displays a comprehensive list of educational and industry partners

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/partners/duke and select any available partner institution or organization from the list

assertions.description: Verify that selected partner's page showcases their associated programs and institutional profile

phases.objective: Navigate to Review the partner's dedicated page for information regarding their programs or profile

assertions.description: Verify that partner page provides clear information about their contribution to Coursera's catalog

test_files.name: flow_detailed_researcher_degrees
test_files.title: Detailed Researcher: Investigate Online Degree Programs

phases.objective: Navigate to https://coursera.org and navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/degrees and click on the 'Online Degrees' navigation link

assertions.description: Verify that online Degrees page displays a list of available degree programs from various partners

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/partners/illinois and select any available online degree program or a partner associated with degrees from the listings

assertions.description: Verify that selected partner or degree program page presents specific offerings or institutional details

phases.objective: Navigate to Review the program's overview or its host institution's details

assertions.description: Verify that program or institution page clearly outlines the offerings and value proposition

test_files.name: flow_mobile_rapid_topic_discovery
test_files.title: Mobile User: Rapid Topic-Based Course Discovery

phases.objective: Navigate to https://coursera.org and navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/explore/generative-ai and click on any prominent 'Explore' or 'Trending Topics' link (e.g., 'Generative AI')

assertions.description: Verify that topic page displays a curated list of relevant courses and programs

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.coursera.org/learn/claude-code and select any listed course, specialization, or program from the topic page results

assertions.description: Verify that selected learning item's overview page loads with course details and enrollment options

phases.objective: Navigate to View the overview page of the selected learning item to learn more

assertions.description: Verify that learning item overview page clearly presents learning objectives and structure
